question: Currently how many Union Territories are there in India?
explanation: The Centre revoked Jammu & Kashmirâ€™s special status and brought in the J & K Reorganization Bill, 2019 which splits the State into two separate Union Territories. The total number of Union Territories has come to 8. This number may soon reduce to 7 as in November, 2019 Government of India introduced legislation to merge the union territories of Daman and Diu and Dadra and Nagar Haveli into a single union territory to be known as Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu. This legislation is still pending.
